content: That's a good choice! LibreOffice is a great open-source office productivity suite that offers a lot of features, and it's compatible with Microsoft Office file types. You may find that it takes a little bit of time to get used to the interface and different tools, but once you get the hang of it, it can be a very powerful tool. LibreOffice also has a great community of users and developers who can provide support and advice if you run into any problems. I hope you have a great experience with LibreOffice!
